body:
Hey all it's been a while, some of you may remember me (I was a mod for just over a year or so).
I just came on to be nostalgic and miss all the people I used to hang out with and see how the server's doing, so what's happened in the last 6 months?

Also, can anyone see my profile? It's been broken for about a year, thanks.

title: Hello again

replies.body: Hey! And sorry i cant see ur profile :/
replies.body_tagged: Hey! And sorry i cant see ur profile :/

replies.body:
Hey, welcome back!

A lot has changed in 6 months, that's for sure ;p
